name: DRYWALL-E
description:
Third-Rate Towel Games presents DRYWALL-E, a 3D rhythm game where a robot is sent to a desolate planet to collect trash and search for signs of life.

Credits:

  • Selena: 3d modeling for objects and obstacles, animation and rigging for robot model, music composition
  • Vic: Game code/programming
  • Yaena: 3d model for robot, design and art
